input.activity_signal: Active company website found via search (https://www.phone.com/) showing current VoIP services. Multiple recent third-party reviews from 2025 (VoIP Reviews and UMA Technology) indicate ongoing business operations. BBB business profile shows active status with comprehensive service descriptions.
input.product_summary: Phone.com provides cloud-based VoIP business phone services and UCaaS solutions, offering voice, video meetings, mobile solutions, and text services primarily targeted at small businesses through internet-based communications.
